tool.name: xcms-fill-peaks
tool.description: For each sample, identify peak groups where that sample is not represented. For each of those peak groups, integrate the signal in the region of that peak group and create a new peak.

param.label: XCMS-Set file

===================== XMCS Fill Peaks =====================
----------- Description -----------
| For each sample, identify peak groups where that sample is not represented. For each of those peak groups, integrate the signal in the region of that peak group and create a new peak.
----------- Input files -----------
+------------------------------+------------+ | File | Format | +==============================+============+ | 1) XCMS-Set file | rdata | +------------------------------+------------+
---------- Parameters ----------
XCMS-Set file | A rdata file with XCMS-Set objects that were grouped and pre-processed by e.g. **xcms-collect-peaks** and **xcms-correct-rt** |
------------ Output files ------------
xcms_fill_peaks_output_1.rdata | A rdata file containing one XCMS-Set of multiple XCMS-Set objects |
